TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DayRenderEventHandler(object sender, DayRenderEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DayRenderEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DayRenderEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DayRenderEventArgs)
public delegate void DayRenderEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DayRenderEventArgs ^ e);
type DayRenderEventHandler = delegate of obj * DayRenderEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示处理 控件的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管不支持数据绑定控件，它是可能需要修改内容和日期的各个单元格的格式设置。Although data binding is not supported for the control, it is possible to modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells. 之前在网页上显示控件时，创建并组合构成控件的组件。Before the control is displayed on a Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control. 引发事件时每个日期中的单元格创建控件。The event is raised when each date cell in the control is created. 您可以控制的内容和格式的日期单元格时提供的事件处理程序中的代码创建事件。You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell when it is created by providing code in the event handler for the event. 自定义日期单元格内容的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on customizing the contents of a date cell, see . 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和编写代码的处理程序事件制作的背景色的中显示的月份日期为黄色。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to make the background color yellow for the days in the displayed month. 它还演示了如何通过添加自定义的单元格内容到单元格的控件。It also demonstrates how to customize the contents of a cell by adding a control to the cell. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Calendar.DayRender Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Calendar.DayRender Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Calendar.DayRender Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Calendar.DayRender Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[CalendarDayRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarDayRender/CS/calendardayrendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CalendarDayRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarDayRender/VB/calendardayrendervb.aspx#1)]
